articles.title: Can Americans learn to love tiny, cheap kei cars? - NPR
articles.description: President Trump recently embraced kei cars, tiny vehicles that are popular in Asia but hard to get in the U.S. Kei car enthusiasts are delighted — but doubt whether much will change.
articles.content:
Sitting in the Oval Office this month, President Trump went on one of his trademark riffs, an aside about vehicles that are popular in Asia but impossible to buy new in the United States.
"They have… [+6566 chars]
